titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the profession and declaration. Made by Iames Marques of Hammilton, his Maiesties High Commissioner, imprinted at Edinburgh anno 1638, in December
Answer to the profession and declaration. Made by James Marques of Hammilton, his Majesties High Commissioner, imprinted at Edinburgh anno 1638, in December.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Revised according to the ordinance of the generall Assembly .. Edinb. 14. of Feb. 1639.
A reply to: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of. An explanation of the meaning of the Oath and the Covenant.
Quire G is in two settings: G1r line 13 has (1) "cleare" or (2) "clear".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
With: Whereas some have given out that by the Act of Councell, which explaineth the Confession of faith ... Imprinted at Edinburgh : by Robert Young ..., 1638.
